title: 魔方世界and doat以及一个坑爹谷歌翻译
author: 爬爬君
txt_content:
闲着没事干，上了外国网站，英文看不懂用了一下谷歌翻译。发现翻译得异常坑爹，网址在此：（请自翻）
http://translate.google.com.hk/translate?hl=zh-CN&sl=en&tl=zh-CN&u=http%3A%2F%2Fdev%2Ebukkit%2Eorg%2Fclient%2Dmods%2Ffishermanmcpvp%2F


http://translate.google.com.hk/translate?hl=zh-CN&sl=en&tl=zh-CN&u=http%3A%2F%2Fdev%2Ebukkit%2Eorg%2Fclient%2Dmods%2Ffishermanmcpvp%2F

http://translate.google.com.hk/translate?hl=zh-CN&sl=en&tl=zh-CN&u=http%3A%2F%2Fdev%2Ebukkit%2Eorg%2Fclient%2Dmods%2Ffishermanmcpvp%2F


来自维基百科和bukkit
